laserGunDesc: Convert electricity into a powerful plasma ball (battery included, do not microwave)
pineappleGunDesc: Re-use everyday kitchen ingredient into a delicious (but deadly) cocktail of explosion
robot_entrance_hasWeaponFirstTime: Welcome to the circus, I am here to help you
robot_stands_normal: You can buy anything here, oil, battery for your weapons...
robot_sampleStand_normal: You will find levels like that all around the circus, activate them for surprises
robot_moveStand_notMoving: Should be easier to aim now
robot_moveStand_moving: If it's hard to aim, there is probably a way to stop it
robot_jail_normal: This is where we put animals that can't behave
robot_scene_normal: And this is my spot as the main character!
robot_benches_normal: This is where you'll be able to see our spectacle
speak_seller: We sell food and souvenirs! Oil that will fill your belly for only 10$!
speak_ballThrow: Try to break all the bottles for a special prize!.... No I'm not moving, yes they are all glued together
speak_ballon: You want a ballon? ...I kind of want to keep them...
speak_empty: My stall is not totally set up yet, but you better be ready! It'll be the best one!
speak_credits: This circus was set up in only one week! Check the board next to me for full details of all our behind-the-scene employees!
speak_battery_noWeapon: I sell delicious batteries, you'll need a weapon if you want some!
speak_battery_noGoodWeapon: I sell delicious batteries but I don't think your weapon have any slot of them!
speak_battery_alreadyFull: I sell delicious batteries but... your weapon is already full, go blast some things and come back later on!
speak_battery_ok: Need some battery? For such a good looking person it's free, enjoy!
speak_pinkObj_isOff: Can you believe it I was tasked to stay here!? Just me and this... big... red... button...
